summary: Request to add an API for counting workflows in the Ruby SDK. This issue was marked as no longer applicable due to an SDK rewrite/refresh.
userImpact: Users would have a programmatic way to count workflows without manual iteration or external tooling.
resolutionDetails: SDK underwent a rewrite/refresh and this feature request is no longer applicable to the current version.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
